annotations.description: I really couldn't find that much on this cocktail, what I do know is that it was created at the famous Milk & Honey in NYC. I couldn't find a bartender to at...
annotations.title: Modern Classic: Bitter Bee

textContent:
6-8 Mint leaves (pinch of mint)
1 Demerara Sugar Cube
2oz or 60ml Vodka
.75oz or 20ml Honey Syrup
.75ozor 20ml  Lime Juice
2 Dashes Angostura Bitters

Shake ingredients and open pour into glass. 
Add crushed ice. 
Top with bitters. 
Top with crushed ice. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=RbvY_eEhSEY
title: The Bitter Bee
